      • Field Detail

        • private static final java.lang.String DEFAULT_FORM_METHOD

        • private static final java.lang.String DefaultFilterPaneId

        • private static final java.lang.String LAST_UPDATED

        • private static final java.util.Map availableOpsByType

          This map contains available filter operations by type. It is used when creating the individual rows in the filter pane. The values in the text maps are key suffixes for the resource bundle. The prefix used in the valueMessagePrefix attribute will be fp.op.

      • Property Detail

        • java.lang.Object bool

        • java.lang.Object currentCriteria

        • java.lang.Object date

        • java.lang.Object datePicker

        • java.lang.Object filterButton

          Creates a link (button) that displays the filter pane when pressed. The title attribute may be used to modify the text on the button. If omitted, the text will be "Filter". The filterPaneId attribute may be specified if the associated filterPane tag has an id attribute. Their values must be the same.

        • java.lang.Object filterLink

          Creates a quick filter html link that links to the specified filter action, listing items filtered upon the specified values. Example usage:
          In the show view this tag can be used to link to a list of related child objects. The effect is that when clicking on the link that the tag creates, the child object's list view is displayed, filtered upon the parent id:

           ...
 
  
 
 ...
          body:
          The body of this tag should contain the text to display within the link.
          Parameters:
          values - A map containing field values by field name. The field is the field within the bean (with the filter) that should be used for filtering. Optionally, instead of the field value, you can supply a map like this [op:, value:]. This map may optionally also contain the key "to" if the op operator is "Between".
          controller - The controler that contains the action to use. Optional, default is current controller.
          action - The action to use for filtering. Optional, default is filter.
          * - Additionally you may use all the optional parameters/attrs that you can use to the tag g:link.

        • java.lang.Object filterPane

        • java.lang.Object grailsApplication

        • org.codehaus.groovy.grails.web.pages.discovery.GrailsConventionGroovyPageLocator groovyPageLocator

        • java.lang.Object includes

          This tag generates necessary style and script includes. Use this tag in the head element of your pages.

          Attributes

          • css - add this attribute to generate stylesheet includes (any value is fine)
          • js - add this attribute to generate javascript includes (any value is fine)
          • (none) - Using the tag with no attributes is identical to adding both. (<filterpane:includes css="true" js="true" />
          deprecated:
          Since:
          0.4; attributes since 2.0
          2.1.6; resources plugin now standard

        • java.lang.Object input

        • java.lang.Object isFiltered

        • java.lang.Object isNotFiltered

        • static java.lang.Object namespace

        • java.lang.Object paginate

          Grails pagination tag wrapper for use with the filterpane plugin. attribute total - a custom count to be used in pagination attribute domainBean - the domain bean being filtered. Ignored if total is specified.

        • org.codehaus.groovy.grails.plugins.GrailsPluginManager pluginManager

        • private java.lang.Object resolveAttribute(java.lang.String customKey, java.lang.String localizationKey, java.lang.Object attrValue, java.lang.String defaultValue)

          Resolve the value given the list of possible sources. Order is as follows:

          1. Message bundle, via "customKey"
          2. attr value
          3. Message bundle, via "localizationKey"
          4. default value
          Parameters:
          customKey
          localizationKey
          attrValue
          defaultValue
          Returns:
